sections.title: Advanced Tools and Equipment Management → Gestión avanzada de herramientas y equipo

items.english: The precision measurement tools require careful calibration
items.spanish: Las herramientas de medición de precisión requieren calibración cuidadosa

items.english: We should implement a preventive maintenance schedule
items.spanish: Deberíamos implementar un horario de mantenimiento preventivo

items.english: The diagnostic equipment has enhanced our troubleshooting capabilities
items.spanish: El equipo de diagnóstico ha mejorado nuestras capacidades de solución de problemas

items.english: Regular inspection prevents premature equipment failure
items.spanish: La inspección regular previene fallas prematuras del equipo

items.english: The automated inventory system tracks tool usage efficiently
items.spanish: El sistema de inventario automatizado rastrea el uso de herramientas eficientemente

items.english: Proper storage conditions extend tool lifespan significantly
items.spanish: Las condiciones de almacenamiento adecuadas extienden la vida útil de las herramientas significativamente

items.english: We need to upgrade our testing equipment to meet new standards
items.spanish: Necesitamos actualizar nuestro equipo de prueba para cumplir nuevos estándares

items.english: The ergonomic design reduces operator fatigue during extended use
items.spanish: El diseño ergonómico reduce la fatiga del operador durante uso prolongado

items.english: Training programs ensure proper equipment handling procedures
items.spanish: Los programas de entrenamiento aseguran procedimientos adecuados de manejo de equipo

items.english: Digital multimeters provide more accurate readings than analog versions
items.spanish: Los multímetros digitales proporcionan lecturas más precisas que versiones analógicas

items.english: The tool management system reduces downtime and improves efficiency
items.spanish: El sistema de gestión de herramientas reduce tiempo de inactividad y mejora eficiencia

items.english: Specialized equipment requires certified technicians for operation
items.spanish: El equipo especializado requiere técnicos certificados para operación

items.english: We maintain detailed records of all equipment maintenance activities
items.spanish: Mantenemos registros detallados de todas las actividades de mantenimiento de equipo

items.english: The investment in quality tools pays off through increased productivity
items.spanish: La inversión en herramientas de calidad se paga a través de mayor productividad

items.english: Modern equipment often incorporates smart technology for enhanced performance
items.spanish: El equipo moderno a menudo incorpora tecnología inteligente para rendimiento mejorado

listening.audio: The new oscilloscope features advanced signal analysis capabilities that will improve our electronic testing procedures
listening.answer: advanced signal analysis capabilities

listening.audio: Preventive maintenance schedules should be based on manufacturer recommendations and actual usage patterns
options: manufacturer recommendations and actual usage patterns
listening.answer: manufacturer recommendations and actual usage patterns

listening.audio: The tool crib system ensures that all equipment is properly checked out and returned in good condition
options: properly checked out and returned in good condition
listening.answer: properly checked out and returned in good condition

listening.audio: Precision instruments require climate-controlled storage environments to maintain their accuracy
listening.answer: climate-controlled storage environments

listening.audio: The equipment training program includes both theoretical knowledge and hands-on practice sessions
listening.answer: theoretical knowledge and hands-on practice

fillInBlank.suffix: of measuring instruments directly affects product quality.
prevents costly emergency repairs.
equipment enhances our problem-solving capabilities.
ensures safe and effective equipment operation.
inventory system tracks usage and availability.

sections.title: Safety at Work - Advanced Protocols → Seguridad en el trabajo - Protocolos avanzados

items.english: Comprehensive risk assessments identify potential hazards before they become problems
items.spanish: Las evaluaciones de riesgo comprensivas identifican peligros potenciales antes de que se conviertan en problemas

items.english: The hierarchy of controls prioritizes elimination over personal protective equipment
items.spanish: La jerarquía de controles prioriza la eliminación sobre el equipo de protección personal

items.english: Behavioral safety programs focus on changing unsafe work practices
items.spanish: Los programas de seguridad conductual se enfocan en cambiar prácticas de trabajo inseguras

items.english: Near-miss reporting systems help prevent serious accidents before they occur
items.spanish: Los sistemas de reporte de casi accidentes ayudan a prevenir accidentes serios antes de que ocurran

items.english: Safety culture development requires commitment from all organizational levels
items.spanish: El desarrollo de cultura de seguridad requiere compromiso de todos los niveles organizacionales

items.english: Incident investigation techniques determine root causes rather than immediate factors
items.spanish: Las técnicas de investigación de incidentes determinan causas raíz en lugar de factores inmediatos

items.english: Continuous improvement methodologies enhance safety performance over time
items.spanish: Las metodologías de mejora continua mejoran el rendimiento de seguridad con el tiempo

items.english: Emergency response procedures must be practiced regularly to ensure effectiveness
items.spanish: Los procedimientos de respuesta de emergencia deben practicarse regularmente para asegurar efectividad

items.english: Job safety analysis breaks down tasks to identify specific hazards
items.spanish: El análisis de seguridad del trabajo desglosa tareas para identificar peligros específicos

items.english: Safety audits provide objective assessments of workplace conditions
items.spanish: Las auditorías de seguridad proporcionan evaluaciones objetivas de condiciones del lugar de trabajo

items.english: Ergonomic assessments reduce the risk of musculoskeletal disorders
items.spanish: Las evaluaciones ergonómicas reducen el riesgo de trastornos musculoesqueléticos

items.english: Lock-out tag-out procedures protect workers during equipment maintenance
items.spanish: Los procedimientos de bloqueo y etiquetado protegen trabajadores durante mantenimiento de equipo

items.english: Environmental monitoring ensures compliance with occupational health standards
items.spanish: El monitoreo ambiental asegura cumplimiento con estándares de salud ocupacional

items.english: Safety training programs must be tailored to specific job requirements
items.spanish: Los programas de entrenamiento de seguridad deben adaptarse a requisitos específicos del trabajo

items.english: Leading indicators predict future safety performance more effectively than lagging indicators
items.spanish: Los indicadores adelantados predicen el rendimiento futuro de seguridad más efectivamente que indicadores rezagados

listening.audio: The safety management system integrates hazard identification, risk assessment, and control implementation
options: hazard identification, risk assessment, and control implementation
basic safety rules and regulations only
listening.answer: hazard identification, risk assessment, and control implementation

listening.audio: Behavioral observation programs help identify unsafe practices before they result in incidents
options: identify unsafe practices before they result in incidents
listening.answer: identify unsafe practices before they result in incidents

listening.audio: The permit-to-work system controls high-risk activities through systematic authorization procedures
options: controls high-risk activities through systematic authorization
allows unrestricted access to all areas
eliminates the need for safety precautions
listening.answer: controls high-risk activities through systematic authorization

listening.audio: Safety performance indicators should measure both leading and lagging safety metrics
options: both leading and lagging safety metrics
listening.answer: both leading and lagging safety metrics

listening.audio: The safety committee includes representatives from management, supervision, and front-line workers
listening.answer: management, supervision, and front-line workers

fillInBlank.suffix: forms the foundation of effective safety management.
requires leadership commitment and employee engagement.
must be clearly communicated and regularly practiced.
drives safety performance toward excellence.
should be job-specific and competency-based.

sections.title: Following Complex Instructions → Siguiendo instrucciones complejas

items.english: Before beginning the procedure, ensure all safety precautions are in place
items.spanish: Antes de comenzar el procedimiento, asegúrate de que todas las precauciones de seguridad estén en su lugar

items.english: The sequence of operations must be followed precisely to avoid complications
items.spanish: La secuencia de operaciones debe seguirse precisamente para evitar complicaciones

items.english: If unexpected conditions arise, stop immediately and consult the supervisor
items.spanish: Si surgen condiciones inesperadas, detente inmediatamente y consulta al supervisor

items.english: The critical control points require special attention throughout the process
items.spanish: Los puntos de control críticos requieren atención especial durante todo el proceso

items.english: Documentation of each step provides traceability and quality assurance
items.spanish: La documentación de cada paso proporciona trazabilidad y aseguramiento de calidad

items.english: When in doubt about any instruction, seek clarification before proceeding
items.spanish: Cuando tengas dudas sobre cualquier instrucción, busca aclaración antes de proceder

items.english: The tolerance levels specified must not be exceeded under any circumstances
items.spanish: Los niveles de tolerancia especificados no deben excederse bajo ninguna circunstancia

items.english: Cross-reference the work order with the technical specifications
items.spanish: Haz referencia cruzada de la orden de trabajo con las especificaciones técnicas

items.english: Quality checkpoints are integrated throughout the workflow
items.spanish: Los puntos de control de calidad están integrados a través del flujo de trabajo

items.english: The completion criteria must be met before advancing to the next phase
items.spanish: Los criterios de completación deben cumplirse antes de avanzar a la siguiente fase

items.english: Alternative procedures are available if primary methods prove unsuitable
items.spanish: Los procedimientos alternativos están disponibles si los métodos primarios resultan inadecuados

items.english: Coordination with other departments may be required for certain operations
items.spanish: La coordinación con otros departamentos puede requerirse para ciertas operaciones

items.english: The revision level of all documents should be verified before use
items.spanish: El nivel de revisión de todos los documentos debe verificarse antes del uso

items.english: Final inspection confirms that all requirements have been satisfied
items.spanish: La inspección final confirma que todos los requisitos han sido satisfechos

items.english: Proper handover procedures ensure continuity between shifts
items.spanish: Los procedimientos de transferencia adecuados aseguran continuidad entre turnos

listening.audio: The multi-step calibration procedure requires precise timing and environmental conditions
listening.answer: precise timing and environmental conditions

listening.audio: Should any parameter fall outside the specified range, immediately halt the process and notify quality control
options: immediately halt the process and notify quality control
continue working and document the deviation
adjust the parameters and keep working
listening.answer: immediately halt the process and notify quality control

listening.audio: The work instruction includes decision trees for handling various scenarios that may occur
options: decision trees for handling various scenarios
listening.answer: decision trees for handling various scenarios

listening.audio: Prior to equipment startup, verify that all interlocks are functional and safety systems are active
options: all interlocks are functional and safety systems are active
listening.answer: all interlocks are functional and safety systems are active

listening.audio: The procedure requires coordination between mechanical, electrical, and quality assurance teams
options: mechanical, electrical, and quality assurance teams
listening.answer: mechanical, electrical, and quality assurance teams

fillInBlank.suffix: any procedure, review all safety requirements.
of operations is critical for successful completion.
arise, consult the troubleshooting guide.
are embedded throughout the process.
must be documented for traceability.

sections.title: Work Orders and Request Management → Gestión de órdenes de trabajo y solicitudes

items.english: The work order system prioritizes tasks based on urgency and resource availability
items.spanish: El sistema de órdenes de trabajo prioriza tareas basándose en urgencia y disponibilidad de recursos

items.english: Detailed job descriptions ensure technicians understand scope and requirements
items.spanish: Las descripciones detalladas del trabajo aseguran que los técnicos entiendan el alcance y requisitos

items.english: Resource planning involves scheduling personnel, tools, and materials
items.spanish: La planificación de recursos involucra programar personal, herramientas y materiales

items.english: Progress tracking provides real-time visibility into job completion status
items.spanish: El seguimiento del progreso proporciona visibilidad en tiempo real del estado de completación del trabajo

items.english: Quality standards must be maintained regardless of time pressures
items.spanish: Los estándares de calidad deben mantenerse independientemente de presiones de tiempo

items.english: Communication protocols keep all stakeholders informed of work progress
items.spanish: Los protocolos de comunicación mantienen a todas las partes interesadas informadas del progreso del trabajo

items.english: Change orders require proper authorization before implementation
items.spanish: Las órdenes de cambio requieren autorización adecuada antes de la implementación

items.english: Cost tracking ensures projects remain within approved budgets
items.spanish: El seguimiento de costos asegura que los proyectos permanezcan dentro de presupuestos aprobados

items.english: Preventive maintenance requests help avoid emergency situations
items.spanish: Las solicitudes de mantenimiento preventivo ayudan a evitar situaciones de emergencia

items.english: Work completion requires customer sign-off and documentation
items.spanish: La completación del trabajo requiere aprobación del cliente y documentación

items.english: The backlog management system optimizes workflow and resource utilization
items.spanish: El sistema de gestión de trabajo pendiente optimiza flujo de trabajo y utilización de recursos

items.english: Performance metrics measure efficiency and customer satisfaction
items.spanish: Las métricas de rendimiento miden eficiencia y satisfacción del cliente

items.english: Emergency work orders bypass normal approval processes
items.spanish: Las órdenes de trabajo de emergencia evitan procesos de aprobación normales

items.english: Skills matching ensures appropriate technicians are assigned to specific jobs
items.spanish: La coincidencia de habilidades asegura que técnicos apropiados sean asignados a trabajos específicos

items.english: Regular review meetings address process improvements and challenges
items.spanish: Las reuniones de revisión regulares abordan mejoras de proceso y desafíos

listening.audio: The computerized maintenance management system automates work order creation and tracking processes
options: automates work order creation and tracking
requires manual data entry for all tasks
listening.answer: automates work order creation and tracking

listening.audio: Priority levels are assigned based on equipment criticality and potential impact on operations
options: equipment criticality and potential impact on operations
listening.answer: equipment criticality and potential impact on operations

listening.audio: The work request approval workflow includes technical review and budget authorization
listening.answer: technical review and budget authorization

listening.audio: Key performance indicators track both efficiency metrics and customer satisfaction scores
options: efficiency metrics and customer satisfaction scores
listening.answer: efficiency metrics and customer satisfaction scores

listening.audio: Mobile work order systems enable real-time updates from field technicians
listening.answer: real-time updates from field technicians

fillInBlank.suffix: contains all necessary details for task completion.
ensures critical jobs receive immediate attention.
optimizes efficiency and minimizes delays.
provides visibility into work advancement.
confirms satisfactory job completion.

sections.title: Measurements and Technical Units → Medidas y unidades técnicas

items.english: Precision measurements require calibrated instruments and controlled conditions
items.spanish: Las mediciones de precisión requieren instrumentos calibrados y condiciones controladas

items.english: The metric system provides standardized units for international consistency
items.spanish: El sistema métrico proporciona unidades estandarizadas para consistencia internacional

items.english: Dimensional tolerances define acceptable variation limits for manufactured components
items.spanish: Las tolerancias dimensionales definen límites de variación aceptables para componentes manufacturados

items.english: Converting between measurement systems requires careful attention to accuracy
items.spanish: Convertir entre sistemas de medición requiere atención cuidadosa a la precisión

items.english: Statistical analysis of measurements helps identify trends and anomalies
items.spanish: El análisis estadístico de mediciones ayuda a identificar tendencias y anomalías

items.english: Environmental factors can significantly affect measurement accuracy
items.spanish: Los factores ambientales pueden afectar significativamente la precisión de medición

items.english: Measurement uncertainty quantifies the reliability of test results
items.spanish: La incertidumbre de medición cuantifica la confiabilidad de resultados de pruebas

items.english: Traceability ensures measurements can be linked to national standards
items.spanish: La trazabilidad asegura que las mediciones puedan vincularse a estándares nacionales

items.english: Automated measurement systems reduce human error and improve consistency
items.spanish: Los sistemas de medición automatizados reducen error humano y mejoran consistencia

items.english: Quality control relies heavily on accurate and precise measurements
items.spanish: El control de calidad depende en gran medida de mediciones precisas y exactas

items.english: Measurement planning ensures appropriate instruments and procedures are selected
items.spanish: La planificación de medición asegura que se seleccionen instrumentos y procedimientos apropiados

items.english: Documentation of measurement procedures enables consistent results
items.spanish: La documentación de procedimientos de medición permite resultados consistentes

items.english: Regular calibration schedules maintain measurement system integrity
items.spanish: Los horarios de calibración regulares mantienen la integridad del sistema de medición

items.english: Measurement capability studies evaluate system performance and limitations
items.spanish: Los estudios de capacidad de medición evalúan rendimiento y limitaciones del sistema

items.english: International standards harmonize measurement practices across industries
items.spanish: Los estándares internacionales armonizan prácticas de medición a través de industrias

listening.audio: The micrometer provides measurements accurate to within one thousandth of a millimeter
options: accurate to within one thousandth of a millimeter
listening.answer: accurate to within one thousandth of a millimeter

listening.audio: Temperature compensation is essential when measuring materials that expand or contract
options: when measuring materials that expand or contract
listening.answer: when measuring materials that expand or contract

listening.audio: The coordinate measuring machine uses touch probes to determine three-dimensional geometry
options: touch probes to determine three-dimensional geometry
laser beams for surface scanning only
listening.answer: touch probes to determine three-dimensional geometry

listening.audio: Gage repeatability and reproducibility studies evaluate measurement system performance
listening.answer: evaluate measurement system performance

listening.audio: Statistical process control uses measurement data to monitor manufacturing consistency
listening.answer: monitor manufacturing consistency

fillInBlank.suffix: form the foundation of quality control.
ensures measurement instruments provide correct results.
define acceptable product variation.
can influence measurement accuracy.
indicates the quality of test results.
